title: Ebuka Turns Up Africa
overview: Nigerian icon, Ebuka Obi-Uchendu embarks on a thrilling African adventure with a squad of friends, Timini Egbuson, Zubby Michael, Jimmie Akinsola, Onoja Adole and Alistair Englebert. This diverse group of friends, some strained, some new, is about to experience the journey of a lifetime. Personalities clash and friendships are tested against the beauty of Africa, will their bond grow stronger?
